6 - Next

You should be ready to experiment on your own by this point, but there’s still a lot to learn. The next step is to read the Manual. It explains the core concepts you’ll need to understand how everything works and will make your learning experience much smoother.

If you find yourself stuck, feel free to join our discord server and we will help you!

More Learning Resources
